body:
Fixed toolbar
Made progress with patchnotes page implementation, missing download on release-notes.
Made progress with fixing of last small issues with tests pages.
name: v1.3.0

body: Mostly functional release. Quite buggy but can be used.
name: v1.2.9

body:
Sticky toolbar issue is back.
Tests and load/saves are in general fixed.
Small tweaks still required for tests pages though.
Patch notes page still resists implementation, logging is also proving problematic.
name: v1.2.8

body:
Implemented patch notes page.
Still to be verified as fully functional.
SAVE/LOAD for tests work in progress still.
name: v1.2.7

body:
Finally fixed the excercise errors.
Visual fixes are still a work in progress though.
Next are also save/load buttons for tests.
And the patches page.
name: v1.2.6

body:
Updated lessons and excercises.
Visual bug in pages background being worked on.
Bug that shows all phase 1 and phase 2 excercises for L2 and L3 as false, persists.
name: v1.2.5

body:
Fixed Home Page.
Implemented better folder separation.
Other minor tweaks.
name: v1.2.4
